description:
Fans are eagerly awaiting next year’s Christopher Nolan epic The Odyssey. The film, which adapts Homer’s epic poem of the same name, has been receiving consistent updates now that production is underway. As you can see below, we’ve now received our biggest update yet, with the first look at The Odyssey revealing Matt Damon as [...]

The post Christopher Nolan’s ‘The Odyssey’ First Look Reveals Matt Damon As Odysseus appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Christopher Nolan’s ‘The Odyssey’ First Look Reveals Matt Damon As Odysseus
